title: Welcome
template: salutation guestFirstName, and welcome to hotelName! Room guestRoomNumber is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything

title: Thank you
template: guestFirstName, Thanks so much for spending your weekend with us at hotelName, we truly apprciate your business. See you next time!

title: Everything okay?
template: Hi guestFirstName, sorry to bother you but a few guests have complained of 'funny noises and smells' coming from room guestRoomNumer...is everything okay up there?
